description: The home page of the website.
The experiences page of the website.
The about page of the website.

Several improvements can be made, primarily focusing on accessibility, maintainability, and semantics. This includes adding `alt` attributes to images (if any), using semantic HTML elements more effectively, and considering a more structured approach for styling.  Specifically, the `style.css` file is currently empty; moving reusable styles from the HTML to this CSS file improves maintainability.  Also, using a more recent Tailwind version and potentially customizing the config can be beneficial.

This CSS file will hold custom styles or overrides to the Tailwind CSS framework.  Currently, all styles are inline via Tailwind classes. This file allows for custom styling or overriding Tailwind defaults.
